description: Demonstrates the Generative UI system with rich interactive components for human-in-the-loop workflows

inputs_schema.demo_type: Type of demo to run: 'image_review', 'data_analysis', 'comparison', or 'full'

cells.name: generate_content
cells.instructions:
Generate demo content based on the requested demo type: {{ input.demo_type }}

For 'image_review': Create a chart using create_chart and then ask the human to review it.
For 'data_analysis': Generate sample data and ask the human to analyze it in a data table.
For 'comparison': Create multiple options and ask the human to compare them.
For 'full': Demonstrate all UI features together.

Use the ask_human_custom tool to create rich, interactive UIs for human input.

cells.name: process_feedback
